entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Pilot Mound
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:42 a.m. CDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. Temperature falling to zero this morning then steady.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Snow beginning early this morning. Local blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to zero this morning then steady. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Wednesday 19 April 2023
